description.ko: 따뜻한 사막 색조에서 벗어나 화산 냉각의 차갑고 어두운 질감으로 전환하며, 기하학적인 현무암 지형과 날카로운 흑요석 유리와 다공성 암석 사이의 대비에 집중합니다.
description.en: A shift from warm desert tones to the cold, dark textures of volcanic cooling, focusing on geometric basalt formations and the contrast between sharp obsidian glass and porous rock.

prompt: A vertical macro-depth view into a tectonic fissure within a cooling volcanic field. The composition features giant, hexagonal basalt columns interlocking like a dark puzzle, coated in a fine layer of grey volcanic ash and pockets of vibrant emerald moss. Sharp, translucent shards of black obsidian glass are embedded within the sediment layers of dark charcoal and deep slate grey. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. The lighting is cold and atmospheric, mimicking the blue hour after twilight, casting a subtle glint on the glassy surfaces and highlighting the rough, porous texture of the basalt. Micro-displacement rendering captures every microscopic bubble in the cooling lava and the sharp crystalline edges of the volcanic glass.
